objects.text:
• Premium 18K gold-plated curved design
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Modern wave-shaped silhouette
• Hypoallergenic for sensitive ears

product_details.name: Luxe Pearl & Gold Wave Hoop Earrings - Timeless Elegance Collection
product_details.description:
• Premium 18K gold-plated curved design for sophisticated style
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Unique wave-shaped silhouette for modern elegance
• Versatile semi-hoop design perfect for both casual and formal wear
• Secure post backing for comfortable all-day wear
• Reflective mirror finish on gold surfaces
• Expertly crafted with attention to detail
• Ideal size for making a statement without being overwhelming
• Perfect balance of classic and contemporary design
• Hypoallergenic materials suitable for sensitive ears

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and elegant jewelry advertisement layout, designed to highlight premium gold and pearl earrings. The background is divided into warm-toned layers, with a golden beige top and a deeper brown base, enhanced by soft geometric shapes and subtle grid lines. A bold serif heading (`heading`) introduces the theme, followed by a vibrant golden subheading (`subheading`) that draws attention to the product type. A tagline (`tagline`) adds sophistication, while a bullet-point description (`description`) outlines key features. A prominent price tag (`price`) is visually supported by a circular highlight, and a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button` & `cta`) effectively invites interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F9F3E9`
- Soft Beige: `#F1E2C4`
- Luxe Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Rich Brown: `#8A6E4E`
- Text Brown: `#6B5031`
- Pure White (text/highlight): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features elegant gold hoop earrings adorned with rows of small white pearls. The dominant color is a rich, reflective **metallic gold (#D4AF37)**, which gives the piece a luxurious and opulent feel. The pearls add contrast with their soft, luminous **pearl white (#F8F8FF)**, enhancing the texture and depth of the design. Accentuated shadows and highlights create a **deep bronze brown (#8B6C42)** tone along curves, enhancing the metallic finish. A subtle background of **pure white (#FFFFFF)** keeps attention on the product. These colors blend harmoniously yet maintain distinction, making them ideal for creating a balanced, high-end advertisement banner.
